reviewText: great product and great service  thanks!!!!!

Once again i would recommend this t oany one who enjoys true crime stories. It is true after the 1st 48 hours it becomes more difficult to find the perpertrater but as this series shows the detectives still try.

We are on the road with a group of detectives heading to their next grisly murder scene. Horror awaits them, as some of these victims have been deceased for a week,  But they break the door if they have to, and walk in to do their job. After looking at the crime scene, they begin their search for clues. One of the important finds they could come across is the victims cell phone. That alone can give the homicide detectives such alot of information. They are able to tell around the time the victim was murderd, by when the deceased stoped answering his calls. And the killers own name could also be on the victims phone, as many murders are commited by so called friends, or by a person known to the deceased. EVERY SECOND COUNTS as these homicide detectives search for clues. TIME IS CRUCIAL. As they bring suspects to police headquarters for questioning, what goes on in there will astound you. These shewed homicide detectives put on an act all of their own dueing these interrogations, raiseing there voices, and showing anger towards the suspects. But time is begining to run out for them, they have to meet their 48 HOUR DEADLINE. Sometimes the person they are interrogating is not the murderer. But that person sometimes knows who the killer is.  This is fine detective work, solveing shocking Crime Cases. When you begin to watch this DVD, you won't be able to  walk away from it. This is a 2 DISC SET. 5HRS 52MINS.  The episodes...SILENCE IN THE GROVE....SHOW STOPPER....FALLEN....TEXAS BURNING....DUCT TAPE MURDER....CUSTODY OF THE DEVIL....INKED IN BLOOD....STRIPPERS REVENGE....DEAD ON ARRIVAL....FISH OUT OF WATER....GOOD SAMARITAN....FOOLPROOF ALIBI....LEFT BEHIND....POINT BLANK....SHOOT OUT.
